%BtnCriticalPage_ToolTip%: Move to Edit Key Page window
%BtnCards_ToolTip%: Move to Edit Combat Bookshelf window
%BtnExtURL_ToolTip%: Open the external URL window related to the tool
%BtnTools_ToolTip%: Open the window for extra tool function
%BtnAddCriticalBook_ToolTip%: Add a new Key Page that does not exist in the game
%BtnLoadCriticalBook_ToolTip%: Load a Key Page from game data
%BtnAddCard_ToolTip%: Add a new Combat Bookshelf that does not exist in the game
%BtnLoadCard_ToolTip%: Load a Combat Bookshelf from game data

%BtnReverseLoad_ToolTip%: Load edited data in the editor to program
